column5: Hi all, So far we’ve had very little now this winter, so getting around by truck on the lake is a bonus. Even better when you can drive off your front lawn and not even half a mile away get into some nice crappie. Rolodex gets to come too even though he takes off visiting neighbors!?.
Cool video, what holds the crappie there?
I think its just the depth, they tend to go to the deep holes on this lake when the fall comes.

Great video, way jealous, still trying to get out for the first time☹️ I noticed you are using a battery powered auger, I have always used gas but am quickly leaning toward a unit like yours  How do u like it how thick is the ice your going thru how many holes can u drill and how do u think it would perform in the colder temps  thx and MERRY CHRISTMAS Miss those Ontario lakes
